events.message: The customer reported a car collision that occurred on March 30th, involving significant front bumper damage and requested immediate claim initiation.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident due to vehicle damage sustained in the collision reported by the claimant.
An agent with expertise in auto accident claims was assigned to handle the case and begin communication with the claimant.
Acknowledgment sent to the claimant confirming receipt of claim and outlining the next steps in the vehicle damage assessment process.
Request issued for police report, photos of vehicle damage, and repair estimates to proceed with thorough claim investigation.
Customer submitted all requested documents including police report and mechanic’s detailed estimate for vehicle repairs.
Investigation began focusing on verifying incident details and assessing the damage to ensure claim validity.
Investigation concluded confirming the collision was accidental and all submitted documents were authentic and accurate.
A settlement offer was prepared based on repair costs and coverage limits, communicated to the claimant for review.
The claimant acknowledged receipt of settlement offer and expressed satisfaction with the proposed amount and resolution timeline.
The claim was officially approved after claimant’s acceptance of the settlement offer and all policy requirements were met.
Payment was processed and issued to the claimant to cover authorized vehicle repairs following claim approval.
The claim was closed after payment confirmation and claimant provided positive feedback regarding the overall claim experience.
Claim documents and records were archived securely as per company policy to finalize case documentation and compliance.
